title: In Treating Ebola, Doctors Have Only Containment, Not Yet A Cure
teaser: Virologist Thomas Geisbert has spent decades studying Ebola and other hemorrhagic fevers. He speaks to Audie Cornish about the current Ebola outbreak, the worst in history, and how it might be contained this time around.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
